sentence: hey marky we are going to change your diaper now aren't we , who is a good boy
awww look there is a rash , you still have a rash , we need to apply ointment wait a minute
it is going to be ok , don't move , let us put on the diaper
all done !
hello junebug , what is up , shall we change your diaper , yes we will
it is a poopy diaper , let us get a new diaper now
yey we changed the diaper !
hey tommy , looks like we need to change your diaper
the rash seems to be improving , we need more ointment
that should get better soon , let us put the new diaper on
done , lets play now
wanna change the diaper , wanna change the diaper , diaper , diaper
the rash is gone ! no rash, lets clean you up and put the new diaper on
all done !
lets change your diaper
oh, there is a rash
it should be ok , we have applied the ointment , let us put on the diaper now
done ! here is a toy to play with
diaper changing time , yes you hate it , but it needs to be done , cone on now hold still
it is clean , put on a new one
yey ! all clean and new !
who has a dirty diaper ? not me , it is you , let us change it !
oh oh , there is a rash , it needs meds
let us clean you up and put on a new diaper
done ! yay ! toys for everyone
diaper change time !
yes you have a poopy diaper , put on a new one
finished !
is your diaper soiled already ?
oh there is a rash too
it should heal soon , new diaper !
all done ! lets play
hmmm your diaper is dirty again , let us change it
putting on a clean diaper
all done !
